trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SEQ_00<tab>Papa Gruff is eager to rid Gridania of his wicked brethren. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SEQ_01<tab>Papa Gruff decides that the best course of action will be to split up. Claiming responsibility for the troubled botanist and lingering voidsent in the Greatloam Growery, he sends you off towards eastern Gridania, where he senses more voidsent lurk. Wand in hand, you sally forth to flush out the lingering spooks with your pumpkin-producing All Saints' Charm.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SEQ_02<tab>The city is free of voidsent, and the burgeoning wave of terror is transformed into a shower of happiness as Gridania's citizens delight in the show you give them. With your task complete, all that is left is to report your success to Papa Gruff at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SEQ_03<tab>Papa Gruff was as successful as you were, and just as the pumpkin-headed apparition is chuckling her approval, the once-frightened botanist approaches you with her guildmaster, offering both thanks and a batch of pumpkin cookies. The clown is so taken with the flavor of gratitude that he becomes more committed than ever to spending this All Saints' Wake delivering shriek-accompanied smiles. Glowing with the satisfaction of her plan seen to fruition, the pumpkin-headed apparition asks you to relate all that has happened to the Adventurers' Guild investigator, in hopes he may direct his suspicious gaze elsewhere.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SEQ_04<tab>Although you attempt to explain that the pumpkin-headed apparition only has Gridania's best interests at heart, the investigator remains convinced that some ulterior motive guides her actions. He will continue to keep an eye on the festivities, but fortunately relieves you of your duty, leaving you free to enjoy All Saints' Wake at your leisure.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_TODO_00<tab>Search for voidsent in Old Gridania and use the /allsaintscharm to transform them.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Papa Gruff.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Adventurers' Guild investigator.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_INVESTIGATOR04785_000_000<tab>That pumpkin-headed harpy is up to no good, I can feel it in my gut. I trust you will do your utmost to uncover her evil plot.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_010<tab>Just when I was getting the hang of being the life of the party instead of the death of it... Let's wrap this up quickly, lest this year's All Saints' Wake be remembered as a disaster.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_012<tab>I sense something sinister lurking deeper in these fields...
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_100_012<tab>...As well as a trail heading to the east. Perhaps towards the market or the Lancers' Guild.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_013<tab>Splitting up will be the easiest way to end this quickly. I'll escort the botanist from earlier back here and deal with whatever still haunts the Growery.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_014<tab>I shall use the opportunity to convince her that what she witnessed before was nothing but an overzealous pumpkin. That should put her heart at ease.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_015<tab>I will leave the rest of Gridania to you. Once the voidsent have been verily vegetated, meet me at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre so we can deliver my master news of our success.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_100_015<tab>Now, let the show begin!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786A_000_020<tab>Eheehee...

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The Wood Wailer and the voidsent are locked in a tense standoff. Flick your wand and use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to lighten the mood.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786A_100_021<tab>Heehee... Leave me to my meal.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_110_021<tab>Only the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can turn this voidsent into a pumpkin and bring its reign of terror to an end.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786A_000_022<tab>Monsters have invaded the city!?
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786A_000_023<tab>A pumpkin? Wait...this is all part of the All Saints' Wake festivities, isn't it?
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786A_000_024<tab>I must say, that made my heart skip a beat. If this is what adorns the streets, I cannot wait to see what the main stage has in store.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786B_000_025<tab>Geeheehoo!

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>The child is cowering from the menacing voidsent. Turn this tense situation festive with the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786B_100_026<tab>Go away, can't you see I'm spooking? Heehoohoo!

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_110_026<tab>Only the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can turn this voidsent into a pumpkin and bring its reign of terror to an end.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786B_000_027<tab><shudder> If I don't look, it'll go away...
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786B_000_028<tab>Huh... What!? It was a pumpkin the whole time!?
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786B_000_029<tab>I can't believe I fell for that! ...But now that I know it was just a trick, I'd like to see it again!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786C_000_030<tab>No force can rival that of terror! And upon terror, we feast!

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>This voidsent means to frighten the wits out of as many of Gridania's citizens as it can. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to bring a carved smile to its face.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWMONSTER04786C_100_031<tab>Hm? Another trembling soul to feast upon?

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_110_031<tab>Only the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>All Saints' Charm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can turn this voidsent into a pumpkin and bring its reign of terror to an end.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWCITIZEN04786C_000_032<tab>What...what is that awful thing!?
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWCITIZEN04786C_000_033<tab>Whaaat!? It was just a pumpkin! I knew the Wood Wailers wouldn't let such wicked things into the city!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FLWCITIZEN04786C_000_034<tab>I've never seen such a feat of illusion before. If the rest of All Saints' Wake is as entertaining, I'd best go and find the main event!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>You have turned all the prowling voidsent into harmless pumpkins. Papa Gruff awaits at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to hear tidings of your success.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PUMPKIN_000_040<tab>You are returned, and that means Gridania is free of mischievous voidsent. Heh heh...let us hear what Papa Gruff has to say.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_050<tab>There you are. I took care of the voidsent still haunting the Greatloam Growery─did your hunt go as smoothly?
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_051<tab>Good, good! Now we can safely say that the only frights in store for the citizens of Gridania are of the decidedly entertaining variety.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PUMPKIN_000_053<tab>I took the liberty of gathering the pumpkins you created. Their punishment will not be eternal, but they can stand to remain in their current form for the duration of the festivities. It is the least they can do in repentance...heh heh heh.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_HORTICULTURIST04785_000_054<tab>There you are, my fearless clown! Thank you for reassuring me. I had worried I might have to retire from my position at the Greatloam Growery and seek less haunted climates.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FUFUCHA_000_055<tab>As the master of the Botanists' Guild, allow me to extend my personal thanks for helping my gifted pupil avoid such a decision. It would have been a grievous loss for all of us.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_056<tab>Oh, it was no trouble at all. In fact, I should thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> for being such an exemplary audience!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_057<tab>A true entertainer brings his all to every stage, be it a grand amphitheatre or cozy vegetable patch. I only hope you were half as thrilled as I was!

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_HORTICULTURIST04785_000_058<tab>That scary, er...whatever that was looked so <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var>! I never could have guessed it was just a garden-variety pumpkin. Truly, I feel privileged to have seen a master of illusion at his craft.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FUFUCHA_000_059<tab>As do I. Would that every day were so filled with surprises!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_FUFUCHA_000_060<tab>As a token of our thanks, we've made some pumpkin cookies from our most recent crop. Please enjoy them in good health.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_061<tab>I do believe I can get used to this “being thanked” thing. Well, since you've gone through the trouble, I'd best eat them before they've cooled.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_062<tab>To my good health!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_063<tab>This is...DELICIOUS!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_064<tab>This flavor...I've never tasted anything like it!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_065<tab>The cookie's aether is tinged with something I can't quite pin down. It's bold, but not overpowering.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_000_066<tab>Is this the taste of...gratitude? Oh, how much of my life have I wasted only supping on terror, when all along a whole world of flavors was left neglected...

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_HORTICULTURIST04785_100_066<tab>I'm...not entirely sure what you mean, but I shall consider your words a compliment, nonetheless. These cookies are but a small token of my appreciation─I only wish I could have given more...

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PIERROTFATHER_110_066<tab>You mean, I could potentially receive <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> gifts!? If frighten─er, performing my act will get me more baked delights, I'd better get to work straightaway! Why, this is shaping up to be quite the All Saints' Wake, indeed!
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PUMPKIN_000_067<tab>Heh heh... I could not have imagined a better day of celebration for all.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PUMPKIN_000_070<tab>Our success here is in no small part thanks to you. As I believe that Papa Gruff now has matters well in hand, I shall return to my manor─pray visit if you are so inclined.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_PUMPKIN_000_071<tab>Ah, yes, before I forget. Do apprise that troublesome investigator of what has transpired here. Maybe he will finally cast his prying eyes elsewhere.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_INVESTIGATOR04785_000_080<tab>What a fantastic yarn! Monsters plotting against monsters, all to make <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> happy?

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_INVESTIGATOR04785_000_081<tab>I admit I find your story hard to swallow, but I also see no reason why a fellow guild member would lie... Very well, I shall take your tale at face value and consider these to be glad tidings indeed.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_INVESTIGATOR04785_000_082<tab>However, I cannot help but wonder if this was all an elaborate ruse. They knew we were watching them, and that may have compelled them to put on a show of charity.

TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_INVESTIGATOR04785_000_083<tab>After all, a monster cannot change its skin overnight. I shall continue to keep a close eye on their activities from afar. I thank you for everything you've done, and hope against hope that the evil has been laid to rest.
TEXT_FESHLW902_04786_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>You now have access to Sneaky Hollow. Speak with the unusual usher at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to be escorted to the costume party.
